Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-3817 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-3817 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package terraform is earlier than 1.3.2-14, affected by CVE-2024-3817
